sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Text.WhatRow function is used to determine the cursor position's row.
sections.text_content: The Text.WhatRow function is used to determine the cursor position's row.
sections.mdown_content: The **Text.WhatRow** function is used to** **determine the cursor position's row.

sections.title: Example
code:
Text.Locate  ( 5, 10 )
        put "12345"..
        put "The current row is", Text.WhatRow
        put "The current column is", Text.WhatCol
sections.raw_content: This program outputs The current row is 5, the current column is 15.
sections.text_content: This program outputs The current row is 5, the current column is 15.
sections.mdown_content: This program outputs *The current row is 5*,* the current column is 15*.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. Text.WhatRow functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.
sections.text_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. Text.WhatRow functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.
sections.mdown_content: The screen should be in a "*screen*" or* *"*graphics*" mode. **Text.WhatRow** functions properly even if the cursor is invisible.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Text.WhatRow, not by calling WhatRow.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Text.WhatRow, not by calling WhatRow.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Text.WhatRow**, not by calling **WhatRow**.

sections.title: See also
sections.raw_content: the Text.WhatCol function, which is used to determine the cursor column. See also the Text.Locate, Text.maxrow and Text.maxcol procedure.
sections.text_content: the Text.WhatCol function, which is used to determine the cursor column. See also the Text.Locate, Text.maxrow and Text.maxcol procedure.
sections.mdown_content: the **[text_whatcol.html](Text.WhatCol) **function, which is used to determine the cursor column. See also the **[text_locate.html](Text.Locate)**, **[textmodule.html](Text)**.**[maxrow.html](maxrow)** and **[text_maxcol.html](Text.maxcol) **[procedure.html](procedure).
